snippet: The New Haven commuter line is losing its rolling saloon; once a staple on the nation’s railways, the bar car has essentially disappeared.
abstract: Metro-North Railroad retires last of its old car fleet, bringing an end to the last bar cars believed to be operating in the United States; bar cars were a national staple since before World War II, but steadily dwindled over the years; regulars gather to reminisce about pleasant memories of drinking on the New Haven line.
lead_paragraph: The New Haven commuter line is losing its rolling saloon; once a staple on the nation’s railways, the bar car has essentially disappeared.

headline.main: Last Stop, Last Drop: Metro-North Bar Cars Chug Into History
headline.print_headline: Last Stop, Last Drop: Bar Cars Chug Into Commuter History
